entry.title: Printer-friendly versions of specifications
entry.content:
Printer-friendly versions of specifications

Once I wanted to have a printed version of the specification to read them when I have free time. After it I explored webmasters.stackexchange and found question about web specifications

After it I found links on CSS 2.1, HTML 4 and HTML5 w3 and HTML 5 WHATWG specifications and that each of stable specs (CSS 2.1 and HTML 4) has several printable versions of itself. For example CSS 2.1 see at the bottom of picture

The list of printable versions of specifications

  • CSS 2.1 plain text

  • CSS 2.1 pdf

  • HTML 4.01 plain text

  • HTML 4.01 gzipped pdf

  • HTML 5 WHATWG single-page

  • HTML 5 W3.org single page

  • HTML 5 WHATWG (converted to pdf and downloaded to google drive)

  • HTML 5 W3.org (converted to pdf and downloaded to google drive)

entry.title: jsFiddle.net
entry.content:
jsFiddle.net

Today I want to tell you about popular tool for demonstration your web examples — jsFiddle. For example, it very usefull to use it on sites, like Stackoverflow. I often use this site to create a highly specialized for a demo bugs (testcase). Also it is very appropriate to be used for the project Highcharts as a visual demonstration various options.

How To

In the main window there are three input-areas (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and the one area to display the results.
In the top sidebar there are two main buttons ‘Run’ и ‘Save’. ‘Run’ button force result area to refresh. ‘Save’ button increment fiddle’s version numner, save fiddle and force result area to refresh.

Fiddle’s demonstration

  • In the first section ‘Choose framework’ You can choose which framework (jQuery, MooTools, etc.) to use and can include normalize.css;
  • In the ‘Add Resources’ section you can include third-parties JavaScript libraries and CSS files;
  • Section ‘Info’ allows you to specify a meta-tags title, description and select doctype.

Cabinet

  • The Dashboard section shows all you’ve made fiddles;
  • Your Public Fiddles section shows fiddles which has title option setted in the Info panel settings

Personal review

I advise everyone to learn how to use this wonderful resource, and to share your mini works with this project. It seems to me that this is the best project for this purpose.
